info.name: Detect Deprecated XSS Protection Header
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated by most browsers. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: www.prix-carburants.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Access-Control-Allow-Headers: DNT,User-Agent,X-Requested-With,If-Modified-Since,Cache-Control,Content-Type,Range Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET, POST, HEAD, OPTIONS Access-Control-Allow-Origin: * Access-Control-Expose-Headers: Content-Length,Content-Range Allow: GET, POST, HEAD, OPTIONS Cache-Control: max-age=0, must-revalidate, private Content-Security-Policy: default-src https: 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline'; object-src https: ; child-src https: platform.twitter.com; img-src https: data:; Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Date: Sun, 21 Aug 2022 01:49:51 GMT Expires: Sun, 21 Aug 2022 01:49:51 GMT Pragma: no-cache Referrer-Policy: same-origin Server: nginx Set-Cookie: public=e35f2a1e7ac0838c8cbe5c9cc59ae017; path=/; secure; httponly; samesite=lax Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains Upgrade-Insecure-Requests: 1 Vary: Accept-Encoding X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Powered-By: PHP/8.1.7 X-Xss-Protection: 1;mode=block Prix des carburants en France, site gouvernemental

Actualité : À compter du 1er avril 2022, vous bénéficiez d'une remise de 15ct d'€ par litre prise en charge par l'État - Aide exceptionnelle à l'acquisition de carburant.

Rechercher des points de vente de carburants

Choix des carburants
Localisation *
    
Aller au contenu
Vous pouvez zoomer sur la carte à l'aide de ⇧ (shift) + Molette de défilement

Rechercher les points de vente pour un itinéraire

Choisissez 1 à 4 carburants

* champs obligatoires

    

    

Rechercher de l'aide ou des informations

info.name: Deprecated TLS Detection (TLS 1.1 or SSLv3)
author: righettod
forgedhallpass
info.description: Both TLS 1.1 and SSLv3 are deprecated in favor of stronger encryption.
info.remediation: Update the web server's TLS configuration to disable TLS 1.1 and SSLv3.

require 'compass/import-once/activate'
# Require any additional compass plugins here.

# Set this to the root of your project when deployed:
http_path = "/"
css_dir = "stylesheets"
sass_dir = "sass"
images_dir = "images"
javascripts_dir = "javascripts"

# You can select your preferred output style here (can be overridden via the command line):
# output_style = :expanded or :nested or :compact or :compressed

# To enable relative paths to assets via compass helper functions. Uncomment:
# relative_assets = true

# To disable debugging comments that display the original location of your selectors. Uncomment:
# line_comments = false


# If you prefer the indented syntax, you might want to regenerate this
# project again passing --syntax sass, or you can uncomment this:
# preferred_syntax = :sass
# and then run:
# sass-convert -R --from scss --to sass sass scss && rm -rf sass && mv scss sass

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: www.prix-carburants.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Allow: GET, POST, HEAD, OPTIONS Cache-Control: max-age=0, must-revalidate, private Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Date: Sun, 21 Aug 2022 01:51:21 GMT Expires: Sun, 21 Aug 2022 01:51:21 GMT Pragma: no-cache Server: nginx X-Powered-By: PHP/8.1.7 Prix des carburants en France, site gouvernemental - anomalie

info.name: CNAME Fingerprint
author: pdteam
info.description: A CNAME DNS record was discovered.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 47671
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.prix-carburants.gouv.fr.	IN	 CNAME
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 47671
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.prix-carburants.gouv.fr.	IN	 CNAME

;; ANSWER SECTION:
www.prix-carburants.gouv.fr.	498	IN	CNAME	www.prix-carburants.gouv.fr.web.cdn.anycast.me.
